column5: Another great video of you, Jack and Roloff enjoying the great outdoors. Thanks for sharing Simon.
Thanks retire55, it would be criminal to live here and not take every opportunity to get out there and enjoy the fresh air.
Looks like you 3 had the perfect day.....it doesn't get any better then that

Hi All, Well, school is done for my boy until September. Last year we went up to Lac Seul together for the first time and he has been bugging me to go back since last September. So first chance we got, we went. Fishing is secondary on these trips but I love them just as much, actually I love them more. We search for crayfish, set minnow traps, geocache, swim, fish, beachcomb, picnic and just goof around.........https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kmWGJmy3d7M
Another great day in paradise. I felt like I was right there with you Simon. Thanks, Hooks
Great video and awesome net man/boy/kid. Once again I'm envious.
Net man Jack is the man!!!
Speaking as a retired elementary teacher with 38 years in the classroom, every child should be blessed with a father like you. I thoroughly enjoyed the video and watched every second of it.

Mission accomplished, thanks again Hooks!Quote: Originally Posted by Draco1206Great video and awesome net man/boy/kid. Once again I'm envious.Quote: Originally Posted by LarboNet man Jack is the man!!! The net man does rock eh?Quote: Originally Posted by ReelmnSpeaking as a retired elementary teacher with 38 years in the classroom, every child should be blessed with a father like you. I thoroughly enjoyed the video and watched every second of it.Ok, now I'm blushing, but it is me that feels blessed to have such an awesome boy.
I can't tell if Jack, Rolloff or Limey had the most fun, but I'd wager a guess.
I second this...are you a teacher? Just brought my 16-yr. old back from Rainy..she had a blast! This video makes me think I started waaaaaaay too late!!!
Kind of, I work with people suffering from addictions and mental health issues.
